title: LinkedIn connection request message Writer
original_prompt: Compose a LinkedIn connection request message to {Receiver: someone you recently met at a conference}, the wording should be polite and with respect.
input1: Hi [Receiver's Name], it was a pleasure meeting you at the [Conference Name]. I truly enjoyed our conversation about [specific topic discussed]. I would love to connect and continue sharing insights. Looking forward to staying in touch!
